unlockRules.rules: Unlock Main Story Part 1 after Part 2
Unlock Character Arc 1 for Makoto Atsukawa after Main Story 2
Unlock Character Arc 1 for Yuuka Kannouji after Main Story 4 and Character Arc 2 for Makoto Atsukawa
Unlock Random Dialogue 4 after Main Story 5 or Character Arc 3 for Koume Momone
